Summaries.eng: In Yongning Village at the foot of Chicheng Mountain, in order to make the long-sick woman heal, Li Xiuyuan, the naughty boy, wants to become a hero, but he always kindly does bad things and makes the village jump. After encountering a series of dangerous encounters, Li Xiuyuan learned that he was the reincarnation of the great hero Jianglong Luohan.
